page.title: 15TRAFFIC ACCIDENTS
page.content:
In the grid there were in 1985:- {89}accidents involving bikes and motorbikes. {0}are fatal, {15}are serious, {74}are slight. There are{16}accidents along the {main Peterborough ring-road. } When we surveyed the main road intersection where the Peterborough ring road meets the main North/South Road,these were our results.{ {DIRECTION LORRY/VAN BUS CAR BIKE MBIKE NORTH 189 8 920 10 18 SOUTH 150 14 750 11 19 EAST 405 5 890 1 4 WEST 147 3 410 0 21
The survey took place on Wednesday 19th.June 1985 and lasted for one hour.
